Html:
I am using sharp develop for developing my application. When I drop any control (e.g. Navigation pane) it is getting added to Non-Visual tray. If I use the control in visual studio it is getting added to Visual tray (control area). Are these controls intend to work with Visual Studio only? Cannot they work with Sharp Develop? Is there visual studio dependency for these controls? Am I missing any dependency to use these controls to work with Sharp Develop?
I would appreciate If some body can clarify this. Thanks in advance.
